title: Quick Knowledge
instructions: Name 5 countries in South America in 15 seconds.

title: Act It Out!
instructions: [PLAYER] must act out: a penguin riding a unicycle. Others guess in 30 seconds.

title: Quick Draw
instructions: [PLAYER] must draw: the concept of 'gravity'. Others guess in 30 seconds.

title: Team Balance
instructions: The whole team must balance on one foot with their eyes closed for 10 seconds.

title: Word Chain
instructions: Starting with 'CHAOS', say a word that begins with the last letter of the previous word. Get 10 words in 25 seconds.

title: Memory Lane
instructions: [PLAYER], name the last movie you watched. The team must guess if you liked it or not.

title: Hum a Tune
instructions: [PLAYER] must hum the theme song to a popular 90s TV show. The team has 30 seconds to guess the show.

title: Secret Message
instructions: Solve this cryptogram: 'VKLIHG ZIV GIBFXB'. The answer is 'POCKETS ARE TRICKY' (Atbash cipher).

title: Number Sequence
instructions: What comes next in the sequence: 1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, ...? The answer is 13 (Fibonacci).

title: Cue Stick Bridge
instructions: Two players must hold a cue stick horizontally between their index fingers for 20 seconds without it falling.

title: Science Fact
instructions: What is the most abundant element in the Earth's atmosphere? Nitrogen.

title: Silent Story
instructions: [PLAYER] must act out: trying to assemble IKEA furniture with the instructions upside down.

title: Anagram
instructions: Unscramble this word: 'ZARDAH'. The answer is HAZARD.

title: Last Meal
instructions: [PLAYER], what was the last thing you ate? The team must guess one ingredient.

title: Finish the Lyric
instructions: Finish this lyric: 'I see a red door and I...' want it painted black (The Rolling Stones).

title: No-Look Pass
instructions: One player closes their eyes and gently tosses a chalk cube to [PLAYER], who must catch it.

title: History Buff
instructions: In what year did the Titanic sink? 1912.

title: Abstract Concept
instructions: [PLAYER] must draw: 'A stroke of luck'.

title: Rhyme Time
instructions: Name 5 words that rhyme with 'BREAK' in 15 seconds.

title: Spirit Animal
instructions: The team must decide on a 'spirit animal' for [PLAYER]. [PLAYER] must then act out that animal.

title: One-Word Wonder
instructions: [PLAYER] must sing a song using only the word 'ball'. The team must guess the song.

title: Mixed Message
instructions: Unscramble this sentence: 'THE FELT IS ALWAYS GREENER'. The answer is THE GRASS IS ALWAYS GREENER.

title: Logical Leap
instructions: Which letter comes next: J, F, M, A, M, ...? J (Months of the year).

title: Human Bridge
instructions: Two players must form a bridge with their bodies that a third player can crawl under.

title: Art History
instructions: Who painted the Mona Lisa? Leonardo da Vinci.

title: Job Mime
instructions: [PLAYER] must act out the job of a snake charmer.

title: Palindrome
instructions: Say a 5-letter palindrome. (e.g., LEVEL, MADAM, ROTOR).

title: Dream Vacation
instructions: [PLAYER] describes their dream vacation in 3 words. The team must guess the location.

title: Band Name Game
instructions: Name 3 bands that have a color in their name.

title: Synchronized Sip
instructions: The entire team must take a sip of their drink at the exact same time.

title: Literary Genius
instructions: Who wrote 'To Kill a Mockingbird'? Harper Lee.

title: Saying and Phrases
instructions: [PLAYER] must draw the idiom: 'Bite the bullet'.

title: Category Chaos
instructions: Name 7 things you would find in a garage in 20 seconds.

title: Hidden Talent
instructions: [PLAYER] must demonstrate a hidden talent for 10 seconds.

title: Whistle a Show Tune
instructions: [PLAYER] must whistle a song from a famous musical. The team has 30 seconds to guess the musical.

title: Pigpen Cipher
instructions: Solve this Pigpen cipher: [Image of a pigpen cipher message for 'CUEBALL']. The answer is CUEBALL.

title: Visual Sequence
instructions: What shape comes next in this pattern: Triangle, Square, Pentagon, ...? Hexagon.

title: Coin Flick
instructions: [PLAYER] must flick a coin and catch it on the back of their hand.

title: Mythology
instructions: In Greek mythology, who is the god of the sea? Poseidon.

title: Historical Figure
instructions: [PLAYER] must act out being Cleopatra.

title: Compound Words
instructions: Create 3 compound words using the word 'BALL'. (e.g., baseball, basketball, ballroom)

title: Childhood Memory
instructions: [PLAYER] must share a 1-sentence childhood memory. The team must guess if it's true or false.

title: Air Guitar Solo
instructions: [PLAYER] must perform a 15-second air guitar solo to a song of their choice (played in their head).

title: Paper Football
instructions: One player must successfully flick a paper football between the goalposts of another player's fingers.

title: Capital Cities
instructions: What is the capital of Australia? Canberra.

title: Movie Scene
instructions: [PLAYER] must draw a famous scene from the movie 'The Matrix' (the red pill/blue pill scene).

title: Backwards Word
instructions: Say the word 'CHALLENGE' backwards.

title: Pet Peeve
instructions: [PLAYER] must act out one of their biggest pet peeves.

title: Beatbox
instructions: [PLAYER] must create a beatbox rhythm for 15 seconds.

title: Bottle Flip
instructions: [PLAYER] must successfully flip a water bottle and have it land upright.
